list_definition.definition: a vegetable that has short branch-like green stems with green or purple buds on the ends

list_ex_of_english: Vegetable crop yield responses to such amendments have been evaluated for many crops, including tomato, bell pepper, broccoli, sweet corn, cucumber, eggplant, okra, snap bean, squash and watermelon9.
